summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 243 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 958 m), feels like temperature (up 2.0°C), inside temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 1.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 242.8m lower than yesterday, 75.5m lower than the past week, 958.4m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1743.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Rain showers likely, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and very bright daylight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
